People who won’t use a tablet PC for a long time on the move,  and make full preparation to some batteries with short life time.
Think iOS android tablets mainly focus on entertainment, but want to business solutions for themselves.

Reviews on Google Android Tablet P101B

Nowadays, it is well-known that Google android tablet plays a crucial role in people’s life, due to top quality, practical function and affordable price of Google android tablet , it is more and more accepted by people as a life assistant or a business partner, and Google are trying their best to offer the best Google android tablet with good user experience. Today let us review on Google android tablet's main features101

Reviews on Google android tablet one: Types of the Screen: There are two types of screen that Google android tablets adapt: IPS and TFT, and it is well known that they are two kinds of best screens and very popular with most consumption electronics devices such as smart phone, tablet, camera, altogether with PSP. Most of Google android tablets take TFT(Thin Film Transistor)screen, take a Google android tablet P101B for example, and this TFT screen has short reaction time, high resolution and more colors, which is so-called “real color” the other is IPS screen, it performs perfect in some moving pictures and owns better picture quality and higher resolution , but it is a bit expensive for it is the latest and advanced technology.
Reviews on Google android tablet two: Android System: you know as the development of the technology and science, android has made great progress and many updated systems begun to pour into the market such as android 4.0 and above version, you know, Google android tablet P101B comes with android 4.0 system, and due to this android system can be customized and support more entertainment and good openness, now android system has become mainstream in the market.
Reviews on Google android tablet three: Memory: Memory is also a key factor to help to improve the speed of Google android tablet. Mainly there are 256MB, 512MB and 1GB volume of memory storage, and Google android tablet P101B at 3gtabletwholesale is equipped with 512MB DDR3 memory, which has a great influence on speed of this Google android tablet.

Reviews on Google android tablet four: Size: Everybody knows that there are different sizes of screen in Google android tablets. You know, the screen is always the direct window for users to connect with their tablets. A tablet with suitable size not also gives the customer a good view effect but also can control the weight effectively. Though Google android tablet P101B has 10 inch screen, but due to its compact design, it is very light.

Reviews on Google android tablet five: Network Mode: The wireless mode decides the purchase to some extent. With the flexibility of work and behave of the people, more people don’t just satisfy the Wi-Fi network and start to look for a Google android tablet with 3g network, Ok, if you don’t have many options, you will be happy to know that this Google android tablet P101B not only has a Wi-Fi network but also support 3g external, this means you can take you tablet to go anywhere and enjoy high speed.
Reviews on Google android tablet six: Camera: The camera is one of the best entertain partners now, some have one camera, the others has two cameras, take this Google android tablet P101B for example, it has 2MP camera and it is very useful when you chat with your friend or amuse yourself.

Which Do You Prefer: Dual Core Tablet or Dual OS Tablet?

It is known that the time of android tablets is coming, with the attributes of technology and science, android tablets show us with a new face, and many newest android tablets with high capacity start to pour into our life, such as dual core tablet, dual OS tablet, etc. Many people may can’t believe this progress of android tablets. Today, let me talk about the differences of two pieces of the newest android tablets, maybe you have a clear answer to which is your favorite.
dual core tablet P724 dual os tablet P107

The Difference
P107 is 9.7 inch android 4.0 tablet which P724 is an IPS 7 inch android 4.0 tablet, in fact, besides support android 4.0, P107 is also a capacitive tablet which can be installed windows 7 OS, which means dual OS tablet , if you install windows 7 OS in this dual OS tablet and it can be called a windows 7 tablet now ,this means this dual OS tablet can benefits people greatly, they can do some activities more direct and convenient without the interruption of limited of android system. In addition, both of them can be called dual core tablet to some extent, in fact, Intel N455 from 9.7 inch android 4.0 tablet is usually called virtual dual core in theory, this means it is not a really dual core tablet, while IPS 7 inch android 4.0 tablet P724 is indeed with dual core, at the meanwhile,P724 is equipped with 512MB storage while P107 is equipped with 1GB DDR3 memory storage, from this point ,we can say this tablet PC multi touch P107 is a bit advantage over 7 inch android 4.0 tablet.

The Same
First ,dual core tablet P724 and dual OS tablet P107 are both from 3gtabletwholesale online store, besides this, they both support android 2.3 system, and they are both capacitive tablets with 5 points touch key , usually They are called tablet PC multi touch, and these two tablet PC multi touch are high responsive and can detect any points of it, and these two tablet PC multi touch can be taken as two pieces of dual core tablets. Although Intel N455 is just only a virtual dual core .Due to support a wide range of video, media, and file formats, so both of them can make you fully enjoy yourself. Most importantly, they are of 32GB tablets, besides support external 3G (USB dongle) or internal 3G (MINIPCIe) network both of them you can use to call your friends by tablet pc 3g sim card slot.

Depends on You
Well, after a lot of detailed introductions, are you familiar with these two 32GB tablets enough already? But dual core tablet or dual OS tablet still depends on you, welcome to 3gtabletwholesale online store.

Especially, Microsoft released the news of the use of Google map offline recently, how to use Google map offline? It is said that Google map offline for Android tablet will support fully used offline, but how much space do you need to prepare for Google maps offline? Take this cheap 3g tablet P701 for example, assumed that you want to go to London, and you plan to download Google Maps in advance, all that you need is to choose “make available offline” in the menu of your cheap 3g tablet, then you will find how much data you need to download, click “OK” then start to download. When you use Google maps offline, and GPS still run well without interruption , and the blue icon which show you where you are still works well, and the compass also work in order, and Google Maps offline works well without Wi-Fi or 3G.

In addition , what we have to say is that this 7 inch android 4.0 tablet supports for a wide range of audio ,video, audio and document formats , it is sure that all your favorite entertain activities and important work will be able to be displayed on your cheap 3g tablet.
